source.query:
select max(updated_at) as max_updated_date
from product;

query.value:
WITH brand AS (
  SELECT 
    rt.id,
    COALESCE(rt.name_en,'') AS name_en,
    COALESCE(
      CASE
        WHEN LENGTH(rt.name_en) < 5 THEN 
          UPPER(REGEXP_REPLACE(TRANSLATE(rt.name_en, ' ', '_'), '[^a-zA-Z0-9_]', '', 'g')) || '_' || rt.id
        ELSE 
          UPPER(SUBSTRING(REGEXP_REPLACE(TRANSLATE(rt.name_en, ' ', ''), '[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', 'g'), 1, 1)) ||
          UPPER(SUBSTRING(REGEXP_REPLACE(SUBSTRING(REGEXP_REPLACE(TRANSLATE(rt.name_en, ' ', ''), '[^a-zA-Z0-9]', ' ', 'g'), 2), ' ', ''), 1, 1)) ||
          '_' || rt.id
      END, 
    '') AS code,
    rt.created_at,
    rt.updated_at,
    rt.temp_taxon_id,
    COALESCE(rt.name_ar, '') AS name_ar
  FROM (
    SELECT 
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS id,
      st.id AS temp_taxon_id,
      MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.name END) AS name_en,
      MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.name END) AS name_ar,
      st.created_at,
      st.updated_at
    FROM spree_taxons st
    LEFT JOIN spree_taxon_translations stt ON stt.spree_taxon_id = st.id
    WHERE st.parent_id IN (
      SELECT st.id 
      FROM spree_taxons st 
      JOIN spree_taxon_translations stt ON stt.spree_taxon_id = st.id AND stt.locale = 'en'
      WHERE stt.name = 'Brands'
    )
    GROUP BY st.id
  ) AS rt
  ORDER BY rt.temp_taxon_id ASC
), 
supplier AS (
  SELECT 
    REGEXP_REPLACE(MAX(COALESCE(spt.supplier_name,'')), '-[0-9]+$', '') AS name,
    LEFT(COALESCE(spt.code, ''), 10) AS code,
    MAX(spt.created_at) AS created_at,
    MAX(spt.updated_at) AS updated_at,
    MAX(spt.deleted_at) AS deleted_at
  FROM (
    SELECT
      spree_product_id,
      MAX(CASE WHEN locale = 'en' THEN manufacturer END) AS supplier_name,
      MAX(CASE WHEN locale = 'ar' THEN manufacturer END) AS code,
      MAX(created_at) AS created_at,
      MAX(updated_at) AS updated_at,
      MAX(deleted_at) AS deleted_at
    FROM spree_product_translations
    WHERE manufacturer IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY spree_product_id
  ) AS spt
  GROUP BY spt.code
), 
cte AS (
  SELECT 
    sp.id,
    sp.tax_category_id,
    sp.refundable,
    sp.moq_limit,
    sp.meta_title,
    sp.loyalty_point,
    sp_table.validity_tag_ar,
    sp_table.validity_tag,
    sp_table.slug,
    sp_table.size,
	REGEXP_REPLACE(MAX(COALESCE(sp_table.supplier_name,'')), '-[0-9]+$', '') AS supplier_code,
    COALESCE(sp_table.name_ar, '') AS name_ar,
    COALESCE(sp_table.name, '') AS name,
    COALESCE(sp_table.meta_keywords_ar, '') AS meta_keywords_ar,
    COALESCE(sp_table.meta_keywords, '') AS meta_keywords,
    COALESCE(sp_table.meta_description_ar, '') AS meta_description_ar,
    COALESCE(sp_table.meta_description, '') AS meta_description,
    COALESCE(sp_table.short_description_ar, '') AS short_description_ar,
    COALESCE(sp_table.long_description_ar, '') AS long_description_ar,
    COALESCE(sp_table.short_description, '') AS short_description,
    COALESCE(sp_table.long_description, '') AS long_description,
    COALESCE(sp.is_loyalty_reward, 'false') AS issue_loyalty_points,
    CASE
      WHEN sp.electronic_product_code = '' THEN NULL 
      ELSE CAST(sp.electronic_product_code AS INT)
    END AS electronic_product_code,
    CASE
      WHEN sp.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE
      ELSE FALSE
    END AS is_deleted,
    COALESCE(sp.crushable, false) AS crushable,
    sp.created_at,
    sp.updated_at,
    sp.cod_enabled,
    COALESCE(CAST(sp.available_on AS DATE), CAST(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS DATE)) AS available_on,
    sp.bundled,
    sp.bin_category_id,
    brand_taxon.temp_taxon_id AS default_taxon_id,
    sv.width,
    sv.weight_increment,
    CASE 
        WHEN  sv.weight_increment > 0 AND sv.default_weight_count > 0 AND sv.max_weight_per_order > 0 -- weighted product 
        THEN sv.weight_increment
        Else sv.weight
    End as weight,
    sv.sku,
    case when
    CAST(sv.perform_liquid_weight_check AS INT) = 0 Then 'False'
    ELSE 'True'
    END AS perform_liquid_weight_check,
    sv.max_weight_per_order,
    sv.height,
    sv.depth,
    sv.default_weight_count,
    FALSE AS promotable,
    TRUE AS is_wishlisted,
    FALSE AS is_gluten_free,
    '' AS discount,
    FALSE AS deactivate,
    ds_country.country_id,
    1 AS category_id,
    brand_taxon.brand_id AS brand_id
  FROM spree_products sp
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
      sp.id,
	  MAX(CASE WHEN locale = 'en' THEN manufacturer END) as supplier_name,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.validity_tag END) AS validity_tag_ar,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'en' THEN sptrans.validity_tag END) AS validity_tag,
      MAX(sptrans.slug) AS slug,
      MAX(sptrans.pack_size) AS size,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.name END) AS name_ar,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'en' THEN sptrans.name END) AS name,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.meta_keywords END) AS meta_keywords_ar,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'en' THEN sptrans.meta_keywords END) AS meta_keywords,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.meta_description END) AS meta_description_ar,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'en' THEN sptrans.meta_description END) AS meta_description,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.description END) AS short_description_ar,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.description END) AS long_description_ar,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'en' THEN sptrans.description END) AS short_description,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'en' THEN sptrans.description END) AS long_description,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.manufacturer END) AS supplier_code
    FROM spree_products sp
    LEFT JOIN spree_product_translations sptrans ON sptrans.spree_product_id = sp.id
    GROUP BY sp.id
  ) AS sp_table ON sp_table.id = sp.id
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
      sp.id, 
      db.country_id 
    FROM spree_products sp
    LEFT JOIN spree_product_inventory_modifiers sim ON sp.id = sim.product_id
    LEFT JOIN danube_supermarkets db ON sim.rule_supermarket_id = db.id
    GROUP BY sp.id, db.country_id
  ) AS ds_country ON sp.id = ds_country.id
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY prod_taxon.product_id ORDER BY b.created_at DESC) AS row_num,
      b.temp_taxon_id,
      b.id AS brand_id, 
      prod_taxon.product_id AS product_id
    FROM brand b 
    LEFT JOIN spree_products_taxons prod_taxon ON b.temp_taxon_id = prod_taxon.taxon_id
  ) AS brand_taxon ON brand_taxon.product_id = sp.id
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY product_id ORDER BY created_at DESC) AS row_num, 
      *
    FROM spree_variants 
  ) sv ON sv.product_id = sp.id
  LEFT JOIN supplier sup ON sup.code = sp_table.supplier_code AND sup.code != ''
  WHERE (brand_taxon.row_num = 1 OR brand_taxon.row_num IS NULL) 
    AND (sv.row_num = 1 OR sv.row_num IS NULL)
GROUP BY 
        sp.id, 
        sp.tax_category_id,
        sp.refundable,
        sp.moq_limit,
        sp.meta_title,
        sp.loyalty_point,
        sp_table.validity_tag_ar,
        sp_table.validity_tag,
        sp_table.slug,
		brand_taxon.temp_taxon_id,
        sp_table.size,
        sp_table.supplier_name,
        sp_table.name_ar,
        sp_table.name,
        sp_table.meta_keywords_ar,
        sp_table.meta_keywords,
        sp_table.meta_description_ar,
        sp_table.meta_description,
        sp_table.short_description_ar,
        sp_table.long_description_ar,
        sp_table.short_description,
        sp_table.long_description,
        sp.is_loyalty_reward,
		    brand_taxon.brand_id,
        sp.electronic_product_code,
        sp.deleted_at,
        sp.crushable,
        sp.created_at,
        sp.updated_at,
        sp.cod_enabled,
        sp.available_on,
        sp.bundled,
        sp.bin_category_id,
        sv.width,
        sv.weight_increment,
        sv.weight,
        sv.sku,
        sv.perform_liquid_weight_check,
        sv.max_weight_per_order,
        sv.height,
        sv.depth,
        sv.default_weight_count,
        ds_country.country_id
)
SELECT 
  filtered_cte.id,
    filtered_cte.tax_category_id,
    filtered_cte.refundable,
    filtered_cte.moq_limit,
    filtered_cte.meta_title,
    filtered_cte.loyalty_point,
    filtered_cte.validity_tag_ar,
    filtered_cte.validity_tag,
    filtered_cte.slug,
    filtered_cte.size,
	filtered_cte.supplier_code as temp_supplier_code,
    filtered_cte.name_ar,
    filtered_cte.name,
    filtered_cte.meta_keywords_ar,
    filtered_cte.meta_keywords,
    filtered_cte.meta_description_ar,
    filtered_cte.meta_description,
    filtered_cte.short_description_ar,
    filtered_cte.long_description_ar,
    filtered_cte.short_description,
    filtered_cte.long_description,
    filtered_cte.issue_loyalty_points,
    filtered_cte.electronic_product_code,
    filtered_cte.is_deleted,
    filtered_cte.crushable,
    filtered_cte.created_at,
    filtered_cte.updated_at,
    filtered_cte.cod_enabled,
    filtered_cte.available_on,
    filtered_cte.bundled,
    filtered_cte.bin_category_id,
    filtered_cte.default_taxon_id,
    filtered_cte.width,
    filtered_cte.weight_increment,
    filtered_cte.weight,
    filtered_cte.sku,
    filtered_cte.perform_liquid_weight_check,
    filtered_cte.max_weight_per_order,
    filtered_cte.height,
    filtered_cte.depth,
    filtered_cte.default_weight_count,
    filtered_cte.promotable,
    filtered_cte.is_wishlisted,
    filtered_cte.is_gluten_free,
    filtered_cte.discount,
    filtered_cte.deactivate,
    filtered_cte.country_id,
    filtered_cte.category_id,
    filtered_cte.brand_id
FROM (
  SELECT 
    cte.*,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY id ORDER BY country_id) AS rn 
  FROM cte
) filtered_cte
WHERE rn = 1
and updated_at > '@{variables('max_updated_date')}';
